member.name: numUsedVgprs
member.desc: The number of vector instruction general-purpose registers used by this shader.

member.name: numUsedSgprs
member.desc: The number of scalar instruction general-purpose registers used by this shader.

member.name: ldsSizePerLocalWorkGroup
member.desc: The maximum local data store size per work group in bytes.

member.name: ldsUsageSizeInBytes
member.desc: The LDS usage size in bytes per work group by this shader.

member.name: scratchMemUsageInBytes
member.desc: The scratch memory usage in bytes by this shader.
